Title: Relates to limiting exemptions from immunizations; repealer
Summary: Limits exemptions from immunization requirements by local governments and private entities to medical exemptions; repeals religious exemptions for certain post-secondary students.
LawCode: Add ยง2164-a, rpld ยง2165 sub 9, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to limiting exemptions from immunizations; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating to religious exemptions for certain post-secondary students
